alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 22 at 12:35PM CDT until March 22 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN YAZOO...NORTHEASTERN HINDS AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 1235 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Annandale, or 11 miles west of Canton, moving northeast at 65 mph. A second area of rotation was located north of Canton and just south of Pocahontas, also moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Canton around 1240 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
